step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting with a comfortable position. Ensure your arms are stretched overhead and fingers are open.
You're doing well with the arm stretch overhead. Keep your fingers open as instructed.
Focus on making a tight fist and squeezing your shoulder blades together as you push down. Remember to inhale during this phase.
Great job stretching your arms back overhead and exhaling. Relax your muscles as you return to the starting position.
Continue to focus on squeezing your shoulder blades together and making a tight fist during the push-down phase.

exercise_summary: You're doing a good job with the Push Down Pumping exercise. Remember to stretch your arms overhead with open fingers, then make a fist while squeezing your shoulder blades together as you push down and inhale. Exhale and relax as you return your arms overhead.
